infos.value: Yes. They are soldiers of Wezette.
Damn... Everything you have said is true.
Aren't you aware? Our two nations have a longstanding allegiance.
It does seem that way. They're full to burst with bloodlust...
Of course it had to be you, Lady Minwu—the one to guide Leonis.
You understand why I have guided the people of Leonis all this way, do you not?
I have no choice. This is an order from the king himself.
We are headed for Wezette Castle.
Do you not understand your current situation?
It is plain that King Khury thinks it better to cast aside his nation's alliance with the spineless Leonis and ally himself instead with Muraga's savages.
Countries rise and fall based on gambles made in times of war. His way of thinking is justified.
Nonetheless, Wezette Castle remains our destination.
If you think us spineless, then pray draw your swords and judge our worth for yourselves.
To save those precious to me, I have no other choice.
Then it seems we are at an impasse.
Lord Mont, please show them no quarter.
They are «Equito», the first division of Wezette.
